publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1049# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow Airport Direct Rail Link—That the Parliament notes the statement in the Association of European Airlines’ report on air/rail connections in Europe that rail links should exist at airports handling three million passengers per annum; further notes that Glasgow Airport, according to the most recent figures, handles well in excess of four million passengers per annum, and urges the Scottish Executive to initiate plans to establish a direct rail link to Glasgow Airport. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-1049# Glasgow Airport Direct Rail Link (lodged on 23 June 2000) Christine Grahame*, Fergus Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Shona Robison*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1049# Glasgow Airport Direct Rail Link (lodged on 23 June 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Fiona McLeod*, Alex Neil*, Andrew Wilson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1049# Glasgow Airport Direct Rail Link (lodged on 23 June 2000) Michael Matheson*, Robert Brown*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1049# Ms Sandra White: Glasgow Airport Direct Rail Link—That the Parliament notes the statement in the Association of European Airlines’ report on air/rail connections in Europe that rail links should exist at airports handling three million passengers per annum; further notes that Glasgow Airport, according to the most recent figures, handles well in excess of four million passengers per annum, and urges the Scottish Executive to initiate plans to establish a direct rail link to Glasgow Airport. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Colin Campbell, Mr Andrew Welsh, Christine Grahame, Fergus Ewing, Brian Adam, Shona Robison, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nora Radcliffe, Fiona McLeod, Alex Neil, Andrew Wilson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Michael Matheson, Robert Brown, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Linda Fabiani, Mr Adam Ingram*
